translation.en: [interviewer] I'm gonna not refer to you by name, so that we keep you anonymous.
translation.zh:
‎我不会提到你的名字
‎这样可以让你保持匿名

translation.en: So, I'll refer to you as John R.
translation.zh: ‎我会称你为约翰R

translation.en: And we're gonna use animation to hide your identity.
translation.zh: ‎我们会用动画掩盖你的身份

translation.en: -Sure, yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-好

translation.en: [interviewer] So... what's your understanding of what we're doing here today?
translation.zh: ‎你对我们今天做的事是怎么理解的？

translation.en: An interview. On... the Audrie Pott case.
translation.zh: ‎是个采访 关于…奥德拉波特案子的

translation.en: [interviewer] What is the Audrie Pott case?
translation.zh: ‎奥德拉波特案子是什么？

translation.en: Uh, there was a... there was a... a criminal case...
translation.zh: ‎（“约翰R”） ‎有桩刑事案件

translation.en: about a night on September 2nd, 2012.
translation.zh: ‎发生在2012年9月2日晚 ‎（萨拉托加）

translation.en: And Audrie Pott committed suicide
translation.zh: ‎奥德拉波特自杀了

translation.en: and there was a bunch of... things out there
translation.zh: ‎还有一些其他的事情

translation.en: and it's a whole case. Yeah. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎是一整个案子 是的

translation.en: [interviewer] I'm gonna refer to you as John B in the course of this interview,
translation.zh: ‎我会在这次采访中称你为约翰B

translation.en: so that we don't use your name.
translation.zh: ‎这样我们就不会用到你的名字

translation.en: And we'll disguise your face to keep you anonymous.
translation.zh:
‎我们会将你的脸遮盖上
‎让你保持匿名

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: [interviewer] How would you describe the case?
translation.zh: ‎你如何形容这桩案件？

translation.en: [John B] It was definitely very hard.
translation.zh: ‎真的非常煎熬

translation.en: I was really tormented in school, like...
translation.zh: ‎我在学校很受折磨

translation.en: I was being bumped up in the hallway and, you know, called a rapist,
translation.zh:
‎我会突然在走廊里被撞一下
‎然后被人叫强奸犯

translation.en: and, yeah, a lot of... a lot of harsh terms and...
translation.zh: ‎还有很多难听的话以及…

translation.en: My car, it got, um... spray painted.
translation.zh: ‎我的车被喷上漆

translation.en: And then on the... on the back it said, like, "For Audrie."
translation.zh: ‎后面写着：“为了奥德拉”

translation.en: [interviewer] So, you felt kids were blaming you for Audrie's death?
translation.zh:
‎所以 你觉得同学们
‎把奥德拉的死归咎于你？

translation.en: [John B] Yes. Definitely.
translation.zh: ‎是的 绝对是

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you know when you were taking those pictures that it was a crime?
translation.zh:
‎你拍下这些照片时
‎知道那是犯罪吗？

translation.en: -Did you know that in the moment? -No. Not at all.
translation.zh:
‎-你当时知道吗？
‎-不 完全不知道

translation.en: You know, we just thought it'd be funny to just laugh and joke about.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是觉得很好玩 只是开开玩笑

translation.en: And kids said they saw the photos.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是觉得很好玩 只是开开玩笑 ‎同学们说他们看到了照片

translation.en: I think the whole football team got interviewed by the police, and so...
translation.zh:
‎我认为整个橄榄球队都被警察审问过
‎而且…

translation.en: Yeah, that's what happened.
translation.zh: ‎是的 事情就是这样

translation.en: [attorney 1] This is media number one of the video tape deposition of John B.
translation.zh: ‎这是材料一 约翰B的证词录像

translation.en: Case name, Pott v. John B, et al.
translation.zh: ‎案件名《波特诉约翰B及其他》

translation.en: [attorney 2] Okay. Um...
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: Going back in time, the party happened on September 3, 2012. Right?
translation.zh:
‎回到案发当时 派对时间
‎是2012年9月3日 对吗？

translation.en: [John B] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: [coach] Mike, out. Mike, out.
translation.zh: ‎麦克 下场

translation.en: [attorney 2] How did you become aware of the party?
translation.zh: ‎你是怎么知道这个派对的？

translation.en: [John B sighs]
translation.zh: ‎（录像证词 2015年1月6日）

translation.en: [all chanting] Defense, defense, defense!
translation.zh: ‎防守！

translation.en: [John B] It is pretty blurry, it was... almost four years ago.
translation.zh: ‎记不清了 那差不多是四年前的事

translation.en: So, I mean...
translation.zh: ‎所以 我是说…

translation.en: I hear this party is being hosted by Audrie and, um, Emily.
translation.zh:
‎我听说这个派对是
‎奥德拉和艾米丽组织的

translation.en: And it was my first party I've ever been to.
translation.zh: ‎这是我第一次参加派对

translation.en: I was a freshman. I just got my license.
translation.zh: ‎我当时高一 刚刚拿到驾照

translation.en: You know, kinda thought I was cool and stuff.
translation.zh: ‎觉得自己挺酷的

translation.en: I drove my friends there.
translation.zh: ‎我开车带朋友们过去

translation.en: [Larry Pott] Sheila and I have shared joint custody of Audrie.
translation.zh: ‎希拉和我对奥德拉有共同抚养权

translation.en: A couple days a week for me, and Sheila had a couple days a week.
translation.zh: ‎一周我照顾她几天 希拉照顾她几天

translation.en: She was always a happy kid, fun kid.
translation.zh: ‎她一直是个很快乐的孩子

translation.en: She loved practical jokes.
translation.zh: ‎她喜欢开些无伤大雅的玩笑 ‎（奥德拉的父亲 拉里波特）

translation.en: [Sheila Pott] And when she got older, we used to like to cook together.
translation.zh:
‎当她长大了一些时
‎我们常常一起做饭

translation.en: Sometimes we would turn on the Food Network
translation.zh: ‎有时我们会打开美食广播网

translation.en: and we'd wait until we saw something that we liked.
translation.zh: ‎等着看我们都喜欢的东西

translation.en: And we would go out and get everything and make it.
translation.zh:
‎然后我们会出去
‎把每样东西都买回来自己做

translation.en: And her friends would come over and play in the pool.
translation.zh:
‎她的朋友们会到家里来
‎在泳池里玩

translation.en: She was very outgoing. She made friends easily.
translation.zh:
‎她性格非常开朗
‎很容易交到朋友

translation.en: But she was very self-conscious.
translation.zh: ‎但她非常自觉

translation.en: So, it would be... the bra, the cami and then the T-shirt,
translation.zh:
‎她会穿文胸 然后套件吊带背心
‎最后再穿T恤

translation.en: and then she would bend over in the mirror and make sure you can't see anything.
translation.zh:
‎然后她会对着镜子弯腰
‎确保不会走光

translation.en: [Amanda Le] She was one of my only true friends.
translation.zh: ‎她是我仅有的几个真正朋友之一

translation.en: We were kind of like an inseparable pair throughout middle school.
translation.zh: ‎我们整个中学阶段都形影不离

translation.en: So, there was not a week
translation.zh: ‎我们每周… ‎（奥德拉的朋友 阿曼达乐）

translation.en: where we didn't go to each other's houses at least once.
translation.zh: ‎…都至少会去对方家一次

translation.en: [attorney] When did you first start accessing this Yahoo! account?
translation.zh:
‎你第一次登录这个雅虎账户
‎是什么时候？

translation.en: [John B] Sixth or seventh grade.
translation.zh: ‎六年级或七年级

translation.en: [Amanda] They were pretty persistent, the boys in middle school.
translation.zh: ‎我们要去那 从… ‎中学的男孩子们非常坚持

translation.en: It was very odd, like... even today I think back and it's like, wow!
translation.zh: ‎这非常奇怪 即使我今天回想起来…

translation.en: There was definitely pressure to have boobs.
translation.zh: ‎绝对会有压力 觉得要快点长胸部

translation.en: And I had none. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我完全没有

translation.en: I'm gonna admit it, I was a late bloomer.
translation.zh: ‎我承认我发育得晚

translation.en: [Amanda] So, boys didn't ask me for pictures and things like that
translation.zh: ‎我好了 ‎男孩子们没跟我要过照片之类的东西

translation.en: because I didn't have anything to send.
translation.zh: ‎因为我没有什么可发的

translation.en: But most of the girls in my grade did.
translation.zh: ‎但我这个年纪的女孩子们几乎都有

translation.en: Yeah, couple of girls in our group of friends actually, they did full nude.
translation.zh:
‎真的 我们这群朋友中
‎有几个女孩拍过全裸照片

translation.en: [interviewer] Did Audrie? [Amanda] No, she never did.
translation.zh: ‎奥德拉拍过吗？ ‎没有 她从来没有

translation.en: Boys always asked her,
translation.zh: ‎男孩子们总跟她要

translation.en: 'cause, you know, she was one of the most developed girls in our grade.
translation.zh:
‎因为她是我们这个年级
‎发育最好的女孩之一

translation.en: So, naturally, boys will always ask her for it first, you know?
translation.zh: ‎自然 男孩子们总是会先问她要

translation.en: Uh, but I made her promise me, "Never ever send them.
translation.zh: ‎但我让她向我保证 “永远不发给他们

translation.en: You'll just get made fun of, or, like, it'll just...
translation.zh:
‎你只会被当作戏谑的对象
‎或者 只会…

translation.en: It would be wrong."
translation.zh: ‎这样不对”

translation.en: [Amanda] We got to Emily's and they were already wasted. Everybody.
translation.zh:
‎我们到了艾米丽家
‎他们都已经喝醉了 所有人

translation.en: They were just, like, very sloppy, you know, pizza was on the floor.
translation.zh: ‎醉得不成样子 披萨掉在地板上

translation.en: People were, like, making out on the couch and...
translation.zh: ‎有人在沙发上亲热…

translation.en: It was just uncomfortable.
translation.zh: ‎让人觉得很不舒服

translation.en: [John R] People with hickeys. Hands down each other's pants.
translation.zh:
‎大家脸上有唇印
‎把手伸进对方的裤子里

translation.en: It's like, I don't know, it's kinda new to me to see that.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我是头一回看到这些

translation.en: [Amanda] Audrie was really messed up.
translation.zh: ‎奥德拉醉得一塌糊涂

translation.en: She was, like, making out with people.
translation.zh: ‎她在跟别人亲热

translation.en: I took her upstairs and had her lay down, but then she just came back downstairs.
translation.zh:
‎我带她上楼 把她放躺下
‎可她又回到楼下

translation.en: So, I left. And then, I guess, things got worse.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我走了 然后 我猜 情况变糟了

translation.en: [attorney] when you went to go retrieve the markers.
translation.zh:
‎那你还记得
‎你去拿马克笔时发生了什么吗？

translation.en: -[defense] Object to the form. -[John R] I remember saying,
translation.zh: ‎辩护律师：反对 ‎我记得当我看到马克笔时我说

translation.en: "Let's go draw on Audrie," when I saw the markers.
translation.zh: ‎“我们在奥德拉身上画画吧”

translation.en: Um...
Part of it, the drawing part was like a practical joke.
translation.zh: ‎往身上画画就是小玩笑

translation.en: Like, we've grown up,  coloring on our cousins, and when someone falls asleep,
translation.zh:
‎就像小时候堂兄弟谁睡着了
‎我们就会在他身上画画一样

translation.en: there's coloring on each other, just 'cause, like...
translation.zh: ‎在对方身上画画 就像…

translation.en: Didn't mean for there to be any harm in it, other than a practical joke.
translation.zh:
‎并没有什么存心的恶意
‎就是开个玩笑而已

translation.en: Audrie actually drew on me in class, like, a few days before that weekend
translation.zh:
‎就在那个周末几天前的时候
‎奥德拉在教室里也往我身上画过

translation.en: anyways, and I was just...
translation.zh: ‎我只是…

translation.en: Yeah, it was just... [mumbles] a stupid thing. But...
translation.zh: ‎挺愚蠢的 但是…

translation.en: It wasn't like we were trying to, like, shame her or, like, be mean or anything.
translation.zh:
‎我们并不是想羞辱她
‎或者存心使坏什么的

translation.en: [attorney] Uh, and for the record...
translation.zh: ‎记录里写的…

translation.en: [defense] Object to the form.
translation.zh: ‎辩护律师：反对 ‎再用力些

translation.en: [defense] Instruct him not to answer that.
translation.zh: ‎辩护律师：要求被告不回答这个问题

translation.en: [Larry] I didn't know anything at the time.
translation.zh: ‎我当时一点都不知情

translation.en: But they used... indelible markers.
translation.zh: ‎但他们用了永久性记号笔

translation.en: Completely covered one whole side of her face,
translation.zh: ‎把她的半边脸完全涂满了

translation.en: lifted up her bra and her panties, drew on her private parts,
translation.zh:
‎脱掉她的文胸和内裤
‎在她的隐私部位乱画

translation.en: um, wrote nasty things on her body,
translation.zh: ‎在她的身体上写不雅的话

translation.en: and then...
translation.zh: ‎然后‎…

translation.en: um, sexually assaulted her.
translation.zh: ‎性侵了她

translation.en: [Sheila] The next morning, I went and I picked her up.
translation.zh: ‎第二天早上 我去接她

translation.en: And I noticed right away that she had green marker down the side of her leg.
translation.zh:
‎我一眼就注意到了
‎她腿的侧面有绿色的马克笔痕迹

translation.en: And I said, "Why do you have green pen on you?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“你身上怎么有绿色笔印？”

translation.en: And she made some excuse like, "Oh, so-and-so did something."
translation.zh: ‎她找借口说：“谁谁画了点东西”

translation.en: [Amanda] She said, "I'm scared. What if... I did something that I didn't wanna do."
translation.zh:
‎她说：“我害怕 要是…
‎我做了自己不情愿的事怎么办”

translation.en: Uh, she had no clue about the pictures, though.
translation.zh: ‎她不知道 她还被拍了照

translation.en: And I remember, I think maybe during break or during lunch or something,
translation.zh: ‎我记得是课间还是午餐的时候

translation.en: I saw a group of boys just, like, crowded around.
translation.zh: ‎我看到一群男生聚在一块儿

translation.en: They were looking down, so it looked like they were looking at a phone.
translation.zh: ‎他们朝下看 看上去像是在看手机

translation.en: I said, "Look at that, like, they're definitely looking at a picture."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“看啊 他们肯定是在看照片”

translation.en: She witnessed it right there, you know.
translation.zh:
‎她亲眼看到了 ‎（与约翰R交谈
‎没有拍了我的照片吧？）

translation.en: [Larry] So, when she's investigating this,
translation.zh: ‎当她在调查这事时

translation.en: it didn't matter if one person saw or 4,000 people saw.
translation.zh:
‎重要的不是一个人看到了
‎还是四千个人看到了

translation.en: Because to Audrie, everybody in her little world,
translation.zh:
‎因为对于奥德拉来说
‎她那个小世界里

translation.en: which was that high school, everybody had seen it.
translation.zh: ‎就是那所高中的所有人都看到了 ‎（奥德拉波特一秒以前）

translation.en: [Sheila] The next week, she texted me around 12:00, 12:30.
translation.zh:
‎接下来的那周 她在12点
‎12点半左右的时候给我发过短信

translation.en: There was like four or five texts, and one of them said, "I can't do this anymore."
translation.zh:
‎有大概四五条短信
‎其中一条说：“我受不了了”

translation.en: I said, "What do you mean?"
translation.zh: ‎我说：“你什么意思？”

translation.en: And she said, "Can you pick me up?"
translation.zh: ‎她说：“你能接我吗？”

translation.en: We pulled up to the house, and I said, "Just go inside...
translation.zh: ‎我们停在家门口 我说：“回家去…

translation.en: and calm down and we'll talk in a few minutes."
translation.zh: ‎冷静一下 我们等会儿再说这件事”

translation.en: She spent lot of the day in her room, on her computer.
translation.zh: ‎她那天在房间里在电脑前坐了好久

translation.en: And I went to check on her.
translation.zh: ‎我去看看她

translation.en: And I knocked on the door and I said,
translation.zh: ‎我敲门说

translation.en: "Audrie, are you okay?"
translation.zh: ‎“奥德拉 你还好吗？”

translation.en: And she said nothing.
translation.zh: ‎她没回答

translation.en: So, I popped open the door, and...
translation.zh: ‎于是 我撞开门

translation.en: I saw her and she was...
translation.zh: ‎看到她…

translation.en: hanging from the shower.
translation.zh: ‎吊在淋浴头上

translation.en: I cut her down...
translation.zh: ‎我把她放下来…

translation.en: and I tried to drag her out of the tub and...
translation.zh: ‎想把她拖出浴缸…

translation.en: I couldn't get her all the way out.
translation.zh: ‎我没能把她拖出来

translation.en: Maybe three minutes later...
translation.zh: ‎大概三四分钟之后

translation.en: the paramedics were here.
translation.zh: ‎急救人员到了

translation.en: And I kept saying, "You've gotta save her. You've gotta save her."
translation.zh: ‎我一直在说：“你们一定要救救她”

translation.en: beelined straight to the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎径直开到医院

translation.en: And the minute I walked in and saw her eyes, I knew she was gone.
translation.zh:
‎我一进去看到她的眼睛
‎我就知道她死了

translation.en: [reporter 1] Santa Clara County sheriff's deputies arrived at Saratoga High School
translation.zh:
‎圣克拉拉县警长的副手们
‎到萨拉托加高中

translation.en: and arrested two teenaged boys.
translation.zh: ‎逮捕了两名青少年

translation.en: Each of them will be charged with two counts of felony
translation.zh: ‎他们将分别被控两项重罪

translation.en: and one count of misdemeanor sexual battery.
translation.zh: ‎以及一项性攻击轻罪

translation.en: [reporter 2] The photo not only made the event more terrible for Audrie,
translation.zh:
‎照片不仅使这件事
‎对奥德拉来说变得更糟

translation.en: it will also be used as evidence against the boys, now in custody.
translation.zh:
‎还将被用作指控两名
‎现已收押的青少年的证据

translation.en: [reporter 1] This is not the first story we've told of this ilk.
translation.zh: ‎这已不是我们第一次报道此类事件了

translation.en: Teenagers, allegations of sex assault, cell phone photos, social media.
translation.zh:
‎青少年 性侵犯指控
‎手机照片 社交媒体

translation.en: It's getting to the point where we're losing track.
translation.zh: ‎事态已经朝着失控的方向发展了

translation.en: What about all of the other teens...
translation.zh: ‎那所有其他的事呢…

translation.en: [Delaney Henderson] My dad came home one night and said, "Delaney, you need to turn on the news."
translation.zh:
‎有天晚上我爸爸回家说
‎“德莱尼 快打开新闻”

translation.en: I remember turning on the news and hearing about this girl
translation.zh: ‎我记得打开新闻听到这个女孩

translation.en: and her name was Audrie Pott.
translation.zh: ‎她的名字叫奥德拉波特

translation.en: And I remember thinking to myself, "I need to talk to her."
translation.zh:
‎我记得当时我对自己说
‎“我得跟她谈谈”

translation.en: And my dad looked at me and he said, "You know, she committed suicide."
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸看着我说：“她自杀了”

translation.en: I know... I know the exact feeling she felt.
translation.zh: ‎（德兰尼亨德森） ‎我完全了解她的感受

translation.en: Even after my assault,
translation.zh: ‎甚至在我被侵犯之后

translation.en: I still go through it sometimes of just self-shame and,
translation.zh: ‎我有时还会感到耻辱

translation.en: you know, all these people are right, what they're saying about me.
translation.zh: ‎人们说我的话都是对的

translation.en: She had only been going through this for a week and had gotten so bad.
translation.zh:
‎她的事刚过了一个星期
‎事态变得太糟

translation.en: Like, if I had had one day and I could have just talked to her
translation.zh: ‎要是我有一天时间 可以跟她聊聊

translation.en: and let her know that I was there.
translation.zh: ‎告诉她 我也经历过

translation.en: That I'm going through what she's going through.
translation.zh: ‎她所经历的 我也经历过

translation.en: And my dad was like, "You know, but sometimes, like, it's just too late."
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸说：“有时候就是为时已晚”

translation.en: I'm just lucky because it didn't work.
translation.zh: ‎我幸运是因为我没自杀成

translation.en: When I tried to kill myself, it didn't work.
translation.zh: ‎我试着自杀 但是没自杀成

translation.en: And I remember thinking afterwards, "Why didn't I take more pills?"
translation.zh:
‎我记得事后想想
‎“我怎么没多吃几片药？”

translation.en: when we called the emergency number.
translation.zh: ‎案件由警长负责

translation.en: -[girl 1] You're always on that side. -[girl 2] I'm on this side?
translation.zh:
‎-你一直都坐那边的
‎-我是这边吗？

translation.en: -[girl 1] Other side. -[girl 2 chuckles] Oh.
translation.zh: ‎另一边

translation.en: No, wait. I want to... Okay.
translation.zh: ‎不 等等 我想…好吧

translation.en: [Darren White] I guess it's a Midwestern thing.
translation.zh: ‎我想这就是美国中西部的情况

translation.en: But around here, everybody's real big on the one finger wave, you just kinda...
translation.zh: ‎但在这里 大家都很重视人际关系… ‎（诺德韦县警长 戴伦怀特）

translation.en: A lot of these families have been here for generations
translation.zh: ‎很多家庭几代都住在这里

translation.en: and are pretty well entrenched.
translation.zh: ‎根深蒂固

translation.en: You know, everybody's connected in one way or another.
translation.zh: ‎彼此都或多或少有所联系

translation.en: Of course, obviously, you have to be really careful
translation.zh: ‎当然 你必须要非常小心

translation.en: of who you're talking about because you never know who they're related to.
translation.zh:
‎你谈论的是谁
‎因为你不知道他们跟谁有关系

translation.en: -All right. See ya later. -[girl] Bye.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 再见
‎-再见

translation.en: [White] Raising kids in a small town is really pretty great.
translation.zh: ‎在小城镇里养孩子很不错

translation.en: Just having daughters is... [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎养女儿嘛就…

translation.en: I'm convinced that they're... that they're trying to kill me.
translation.zh: ‎我相信他们想杀了我

translation.en: I was elected sheriff in 2008.
translation.zh: ‎我2008年当选警长

translation.en: And then was re-elected in 2012.
translation.zh: ‎2012年再次当选

translation.en: Um, you know, not to sound like a Harry Truman cliché,
translation.zh: ‎不想说哈里杜鲁门那种陈词滥调

translation.en: but the buck really does stop here. There's nobody above the sheriff.
translation.zh:
‎但决定要我来做
‎而且责任要我来担 这里警长最大

translation.en: You know, it's safe to walk down these sidewalks at night
translation.zh: ‎（酒吧） ‎晚上在路边走很安全

translation.en: and you don't have to worry about,
translation.zh: ‎不必担心

translation.en: somebody jumping out from the bushes
translation.zh: ‎有人从草丛中跳出来

translation.en: and hitting you on the head and taking your wallet.
translation.zh: ‎打你的头 抢你的包

translation.en: We don't want to fool ourselves into thinking that
translation.zh: ‎我们不想自欺欺人地说

translation.en: we don't have things that go on here,
translation.zh: ‎这里从来没发生过这种事

translation.en: but we take a pretty proactive approach and...
translation.zh: ‎但我们采取了有效的措施而且…

translation.en: you know, we try to deal with things swiftly.
translation.zh: ‎迅速地解决案件

translation.en: Something that comes in as a sexual assault,
translation.zh: ‎发生性侵犯这种事

translation.en: certainly raises your ire.
translation.zh: ‎肯定会让人愤怒

translation.en: Based upon the information that was given by the girls,
translation.zh: ‎根据这两个女孩子所提供的信息

translation.en: we had a list of names of people that had been at this house.
translation.zh:
‎我们列出了一份
‎案发时在房子里的人的名单

translation.en: We were able to round them up, bring them in, and we went from there.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以把他们一起抓起来
‎进而开始调查

translation.en: Tell me about--
translation.zh:
‎（诺德韦县警局队长
‎大卫格利登）

translation.en: [White] From the time of call, to victims interviewed,
translation.zh: ‎从接到报案 跟受害人访谈

translation.en: suspects interviewed, people in jail...
translation.zh: ‎嫌疑人审问 收押进监…

translation.en: we're talking about four hours.
translation.zh: ‎只用了四小时

translation.en: That's pretty darn quick.
translation.zh: ‎这非常迅速

translation.en: [Charlie] Monday, we went to school.
translation.zh: ‎周一 我们去学校

translation.en: And... It was 180 from that Friday.
translation.zh: ‎情况跟周五比 发生了180度大转折

translation.en: The Friday before. It was...
translation.zh: ‎是上周五…

translation.en: one school divided.
translation.zh: ‎学校里的情况不一样了

translation.en: It was weird, because I always sat at a table filled with people.
translation.zh:
‎很奇怪 因为以前
‎总有很多人跟我坐一张桌子

translation.en: Like, my teammates.
translation.zh: ‎比如 队友们

translation.en: People I thought were my friends.
translation.zh: ‎我以为是我的朋友

translation.en: I had absolutely nobody. [chuckles] No one.
translation.zh: ‎我完全没有朋友 一个都没有

translation.en: I was one of the athletes.
translation.zh: ‎我是学校体育代表队的一员

translation.en: I was All-Conference and All-District in sports and...
translation.zh: ‎参加全美比赛

translation.en: once all that happened, that was all taken from me in an instant.
translation.zh:
‎而那件事发生之后
‎我立刻就无法参赛了

translation.en: I was now known as "Daisy's brother."
translation.zh: ‎我的身份是“黛西的哥哥”

translation.en: [Michael Coleman] And it's a girl. Catherine Daisy.
translation.zh: ‎是个女孩 凯瑟琳黛西

translation.en: Okay, go. Go. Get your mother.
translation.zh: ‎好的 去 去找妈妈

translation.en: -Get your mother. -[giggling]
translation.zh: ‎找妈妈

translation.en: [Melinda] Mike was actually an electrical engineer when I met him.
translation.zh: ‎我认识他时 他是个电子工程师

translation.en: And, um, I was in vet school
translation.zh: ‎我当时在上兽医学校

translation.en: and he told me he had always wanted to be a doctor.
translation.zh: ‎他跟我说他一直都想当名医生

translation.en: [chuckles] So, for the next...
translation.zh: ‎于是 接下来…

translation.en: Gosh, four years of med school, internship and then residency,
translation.zh: ‎四年的医学院 实习然后是住院医师

translation.en: I supported the family and had...
translation.zh: ‎我支撑着这个家…

translation.en: had babies every 20 months. [laughs] It's pretty much...
translation.zh: ‎每20个月就生一个孩子 非常…

translation.en: Sissy eating ice cream.
translation.zh: ‎妹妹吃冰淇淋 ‎（1999年1月12日）

translation.en: Mom.
translation.zh: ‎妈

translation.en: [Daisy] Before my dad died,
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸去世前

translation.en: I always remembered thinking that he's never gonna die.
translation.zh: ‎我一直以为他永远不会死

translation.en: Like, he's too big and strong to die.
translation.zh: ‎他非常强壮 不可能死

translation.en: Literally nothing's gonna happen to him.
translation.zh: ‎什么都不会发生在他身上

translation.en: [Michael] And there's the birthday girl. Cheese.
translation.zh: ‎小寿星来了 茄子

translation.en: I'll love this 20 years from now,
translation.zh: ‎我20年后肯定会很喜欢这一幕

translation.en: just seeing what I'm seeing, a close-up of Daisy.
translation.zh: ‎看着眼前的一切 看着黛西长大

translation.en: [Daisy] I was about nine at the time.
translation.zh: ‎我当时差不多9岁

translation.en: And we were heading to a wrestling tournament.
translation.zh: ‎正赶去看摔跤比赛

translation.en: Some black ice had frozen over the night before.
translation.zh: ‎前一晚路上结了些暗冰

translation.en: So, when we drove over it, my dad lost total control of the wheel.
translation.zh:
‎当我们从上面开过去时
‎我爸爸完全失去了对轮子的控制

translation.en: And we ended up upside down in a ravine.
translation.zh: ‎车子翻进了一个深沟里

translation.en: [Charlie] When we got to the hospital, I sat there for probably two, three hours.
translation.zh:
‎我们到医院的时候
‎我在那里坐了差不多两三个小时

translation.en: I was waiting for one of those Disney movie fantasies to come to life,
translation.zh: ‎我等着希望有奇迹可以发生

translation.en: where he woke up.
translation.zh: ‎他会醒过来

translation.en: But he never did.
translation.zh: ‎但他再也没有醒过来

translation.en: [Melinda] At first, it was just shock for a while.
translation.zh: ‎开始 一时间很难从中缓过神来

translation.en: And each of them had a tough year.
translation.zh: ‎每个孩子那一年都很难受

translation.en: And with Daisy, she was so close to her dad.
translation.zh: ‎黛西跟她爸爸很亲近

translation.en: She was such a daddy's girl.
translation.zh: ‎她是爸爸的小公主

translation.en: He would always rock her to sleep and...
translation.zh:
‎他晚上会哄她入睡 ‎早上坐在椅子上
‎让女儿坐在自己的腿上…

translation.en: she would sit on his lap in the chair in the morning and...
translation.zh:
‎早上坐在椅子上
‎让女儿坐在自己的腿上…

translation.en: I worried a lot about how she would handle it.
translation.zh: ‎我很担心她如何接受这件事

translation.en: Not that we wanted to erase a memory or, not have pictures and stuff,
translation.zh:
‎并不是我们要删除记忆
‎扔掉照片和其他东西

translation.en: but it was hard to go by the place on the road where he'd been killed
translation.zh: ‎但路过他发生意外的那个事发地

translation.en: and his old practice, which was now an administrative building.
translation.zh:
‎还有以前是他工作的地方
‎现在是行政大楼了 都会让人难受

translation.en: We decided it would be good to just not be living with ghosts all the time.
translation.zh: ‎我们决定远离伤心地

translation.en: So, the plan was to go somewhere not too far away,
translation.zh: ‎所以 计划是搬去一个不太远

translation.en: and... not so much larger that it would be a shock to the kids.
translation.zh: ‎也别太大的地方 以免吓到孩子们

translation.en: And where they could still come back and visit their friends.
translation.zh: ‎而且他们还可以回来见见朋友

translation.en: [Charlie] After Dad died, we looked around and looked around at places.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸去世后 我们找过很多地方 ‎（马里维尔）

translation.en: And the decision to move to Maryville...
translation.zh: ‎然后决定搬去马里维尔…

translation.en: it fit like a shoe. It was everything we could've asked for.
translation.zh:
‎感觉那里非常合适
‎就完全符合我们想要的

translation.en: It was about an hour from Albany.
translation.zh: ‎那里距离奥尔巴尼大概有一小时车程

translation.en: It was small, but it was also big enough
translation.zh: ‎很小但也大到

translation.en: that everybody didn't know everything about you.
translation.zh: ‎不会让人对你无所不知

translation.en: The football team had just won state that year.
translation.zh: ‎橄榄球队那年刚赢了州冠军

translation.en: So, I knew I was gonna get to play football for a powerhouse program
translation.zh: ‎我知道我会进入到一支强队

translation.en: and I kinda fell in love with the entire thing.
translation.zh: ‎我爱上了这里的一切

translation.en: I was my own person, finally, and none of it had to do with
translation.zh: ‎我终于可以做自己 终于

translation.en: anything bad that had ever happened before.
translation.zh:
‎无论以前发生过什么糟糕的事
‎都没什么关系了

translation.en: [Jim Fall] Last year, the high school, the university,
translation.zh: ‎去年 高中 大学

translation.en: the junior high, the junior varsity...
translation.zh: ‎中学 校队…

translation.en: Nobody lost a football game.
translation.zh: ‎从没输过任何一场比赛

translation.en: We were like 60-0 for the year.
translation.zh: ‎（马里维尔市长吉米法尔） ‎我们那年60场全胜

translation.en: This gets really hokey, but that's... that's small-town America, and that's...
translation.zh:
‎这有些老生常谈
‎但我们这可只是个小城镇

translation.en: That's where we are and I guess that's what I am, and I'm proud of it.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们的成就
‎这就是我 我很骄傲

translation.en: [Melinda] It just felt like a fresh start and kind of a weight lifted.
translation.zh:
‎这感觉是个全新的开始
‎有点如释重负

translation.en: [woman] Okay, sweetie. All set.
translation.zh: ‎好的 亲爱的 都好了

translation.en: [Melinda] It's kind of empowering in a way.
translation.zh: ‎某种程度上有种自强的感觉

translation.en: To... have to support the whole family and the triumphs, the feeling strong.
translation.zh: ‎支撑着这个家 有所成就 感觉很强大

translation.en: We were pretty happy there for a while.
translation.zh: ‎有段时间我们非常开心

translation.en: [Charlie] Good.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: Right when things started getting better, Daisy's sexual assault case happened and...
translation.zh:
‎在事情刚刚转好的时候
‎黛西的性侵犯案件就发生了

translation.en: Maryville being that kind of blessing to me and my family just...
translation.zh:
‎那个我和我家人
‎认为有幸搬来的马里维尔…

translation.en: It really did kind of dissolve in an overnight fashion.
translation.zh: ‎一夜之间就消解了

translation.en: [Daisy] Do you know how, like, Jay Z, it's like J-A-Y-Z?
translation.zh:
‎你知道怎么拼写Jay Z
‎J-A-Y-Z？

translation.en: -[Paige] Yeah. -I'm doing that, but with a D.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-我就这么写的 但加了个D

translation.en: -So it's like Day-Z. -Oh. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎就变成了Day-Z

translation.en: [Paige] Where are the scissors?
translation.zh: ‎剪子呢？

translation.en: [Daisy in funny accent] You know what? Quit your whining.
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？别抱怨了

translation.en: I buy you a T-shirt with some glittered letters and all you do is complain.
translation.zh:
‎我给你买了件带亮字的T恤
‎而你就只有抱怨

translation.en: I pay for your school. I feed you, clothe you.
translation.zh: ‎我给你付学费 供你吃喝 给你买衣服

translation.en: Put a roof over your head. All I hear is naggin'.
translation.zh:
‎让你居有定所
‎而我听到的就只有挑刺儿

translation.en: [Robin Bourland] For Paige, I think, it's kind of a double-edged sword.
translation.zh: ‎对佩吉来说 这有点像双刃剑

translation.en: The juvenile that assaulted Paige went to court
translation.zh: ‎侵犯佩吉的青少年上了法庭

translation.en: and the judge asked him if he had raped Paige.
translation.zh: ‎法官问他是否强奸了佩吉 ‎（佩吉的母亲罗宾伯兰）

translation.en: And he said, "Yes." He said, "Was she intoxicated?"
translation.zh:
‎他说：“是的”
‎他问：“她喝醉了吗？”

translation.en: And he said, "Yes." He said, "Did she tell you 'no'?"
translation.zh:
‎他说：“是的”
‎他问：“她跟你说不了吗？”

translation.en: And he said, "Yes."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“是的”

translation.en: He was the only one out of the whole bunch that admitted what he did.
translation.zh: ‎他是那些人里唯一承认自己罪行的人

translation.en: And I think it was probably healing for her to hear that.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得听到这个
‎可能对她来说是种治愈

translation.en: [Daisy] Don't be shady.
translation.zh: ‎不要怀疑

translation.en: [Robin] The negative is, she carried around a lot of guilt about what happened to Daisy.
translation.zh:
‎负面影响是
‎她为黛西的事而感到愧疚

translation.en: [Daisy] Ah, success.
translation.zh: ‎成功了

translation.en: [Daisy] I was just in kind of total shock.
translation.zh: ‎我完全震惊了

translation.en: Like, I thought something bad would never happen to me.
translation.zh:
‎我以为永远不会
‎有不好的事发生在我身上

translation.en: That after my dad died,
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸去世以后

translation.en: like, I already had my deal of grief in life. I get to...
translation.zh: ‎我的人生已经很悲伤了 我可以…

translation.en: just live a life where I'm invincible now, like...
translation.zh: ‎在生活中做到无往不克

translation.en: And that's just a stupid teenage thought.
translation.zh: ‎那只是青少年愚蠢的想法罢了

translation.en: We really aren't invincible.
translation.zh: ‎我们真的做不到无往不克

translation.en: People really were kind of, like, verbally attacking me.
translation.zh: ‎人们用言语攻击我

translation.en: A lot people would just say things, like... calling me a liar.
translation.zh: ‎很多人会说…说我撒谎

translation.en: I was told not to say anything because it could just mess with the case.
translation.zh:
‎我被告知什么都别说
‎因为这可能会导致案子变得复杂

translation.en: Like, I really wanted to stand up for myself,
translation.zh: ‎我真的想为自己申诉

translation.en: because not very many people were standing up for me.
translation.zh: ‎因为没有多少人支持我

translation.en: [Charlie] One day, my sister was walking to class in the hallway from the bathroom.
translation.zh:
‎有一天 我妹妹从卫生间出来
‎在走廊里往教室走

translation.en: This kid in my class, he decided he was gonna call her "a lying slut"
translation.zh:
‎我班上的一个同学
‎决定叫她“撒谎的荡妇”

translation.en: and yell it outside of the door.
translation.zh: ‎并在门外喊

translation.en: And she heard it and she ran back to the bathroom crying.
translation.zh: ‎她听到了 跑回卫生间里哭

translation.en: I can't tell you what kind of things ran through my mind.
translation.zh: ‎我没法告诉你我当时想要干什么

translation.en: I said something to him, like, along the lines of,
translation.zh: ‎我对他说

translation.en: "Don't you ever say anything to her again."
translation.zh: ‎“你敢再对她说任何话”

translation.en: And I knew for a fact, he's a little weeny bag.
translation.zh: ‎但我知道 他特别矮小

translation.en: He would have been easy to kick the crap out of.
translation.zh: ‎要揍他易如反掌

translation.en: There was kind of a rumor, there was no for sure about it,
translation.zh: ‎当时有个谣言 不太肯定

translation.en: but I found out from the grapevine that there was a video.
translation.zh: ‎但传闻说有段视频

translation.en: One of the few people I still talk to,
translation.zh: ‎其中一个跟我还来往的人

translation.en: had seen it and heard about it being passed around.
translation.zh:
‎看过那段视频
‎并且听说它已经被传开了

translation.en: He said that it was kind of blurry and it was really dark.
translation.zh: ‎他说视频有点模糊而且光线很差

translation.en: And then it got more graphic and...
translation.zh: ‎然后图像清晰点的部分

translation.en: him on top of her and she was just kind of, like...
translation.zh: ‎能看到他骑在她身上 而她…

translation.en: limp and not really functioning very well.
translation.zh: ‎身体瘫软也没什么反应

translation.en: He guaranteed I didn't wanna see it
translation.zh: ‎他肯定我不会想看的

translation.en: and if I did, that bad things would happen.
translation.zh:
‎而且要是我看了
‎就会有不好的事发生

translation.en: [Glidden] I know I'm not as young, sharp and smart as you young guys.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我没你们年轻人
‎年轻 敏锐 聪明

translation.en: [White] Within four hours of getting the initial call,
translation.zh: ‎接到报警后的四个小时之内

translation.en: that phone was in evidence.
translation.zh: ‎那部手机就被收作证据

translation.en: Um, the phone was sent to the forensic laboratory in Kansas City.
translation.zh: ‎手机被送到堪萨斯城的犯罪实验室

translation.en: Their report came back,
translation.zh: ‎之后接到他们的报告

translation.en: said that whatever was on that phone was deleted
translation.zh: ‎说手机里的内容被删除了

translation.en: and that through the magic of Apple computers,
translation.zh: ‎是在苹果电脑上删的

translation.en: when they say delete, they mean delete.
translation.zh: ‎他们说的删除是永久性删除

translation.en: It's not like a regular computer or an Android phone,
translation.zh: ‎不像普通电脑或安卓手机

translation.en: where you can go back... Where you can go back... Move.
translation.zh: ‎删除之后还可以恢复…走开

translation.en: And you can piece stuff back together on a hard drive.
translation.zh: ‎可以通过硬盘把东西找回来

translation.en: When they say delete, they mean delete.
translation.zh: ‎他们说的删除是无法恢复的

translation.en: All the people saying that there's a video out there, all the people that are saying that they saw a video,
translation.zh: ‎人人都说有个视频在流传 他们看过

translation.en: there's no nice way to say it, they're liars.
translation.zh: ‎这么说不好 但他们在撒谎

translation.en: You know, unfortunately, you have a lot of people involved in this
translation.zh: ‎很遗憾 很多牵涉进来的人

translation.en: that are running around, telling a lot of stories.
translation.zh: ‎到处散播传言

translation.en: You know, and without pointing fingers...
translation.zh: ‎不是具体指谁…

translation.en: it serves to benefit people's causes
translation.zh: ‎人们总喜欢

translation.en: by making a lot of things up that really didn't happen and really doesn't exist.
translation.zh:
‎编造一些根本没发生过
‎或不存在的事情

translation.en: But don't underestimate the need for attention.
translation.zh: ‎但是别低估有人想要寻求关注

translation.en: Especially young girls.
translation.zh: ‎尤其是年轻女孩们

translation.en: There's a lot of pressure on young girls in our society
translation.zh:
‎我们的社会
‎给了年轻女孩有很多压力

translation.en: to be pretty, to be liked, to... to be the popular one.
translation.zh:
‎要漂亮 要招人喜欢

translation.en: In a small town, in a small area,

translation.en: everybody is related, everybody is somehow connected,

translation.en: it's harder, sometimes, to separate yourselves.

translation.en: The one that is the banner for your community,

‎你不想把这些事情
‎跟他们联系在一块儿

translation.en: The rape, the Maryville rape, the Coleman rape.

‎强奸 马里维尔强奸案

translation.en: Nothing that occurred that night ever, ever,

translation.en: the people of that age, in the state of Missouri,

‎那么如果你跟一个无意识 ‎或基本无意识的人发生性关系

translation.zh:
‎或基本无意识的人发生性关系
‎强迫行为这一说法就不适用吗？

‎我们被贴上的标签
‎我认为那并不是我们

translation.en: and you're gonna find hundreds of posts.

‎（佩吉帕克赫斯特） ‎另一些人支持巴奈特一家

translation.zh: ‎引起全国性关注的

translation.en: in a teenage rape investigation in Maryville, Missouri, that has grabbed headlines nationwide.

‎马里维尔青少年强奸案调查
‎今晚有了新进展

translation.en: has been put in charge of taking a second look at the case.

translation.en: [Daisy] I was excited.

translation.en: I felt like I was going to be able to work with someone
translation.zh:
‎我感觉要跟 ‎真正关注此案子
‎并愿意付诸努力的人合作

translation.zh:
‎真正关注此案子
‎并愿意付诸努力的人合作

translation.zh: ‎20年前 我们修了一个上千英亩的湖

translation.en: that has become an area of recreational draw
translation.zh: ‎如今那里成为了休闲胜地

translation.en: and a championship golf course

translation.en: and one of the 100 best fishing places in the country and...
translation.zh:
‎以及全国百强最佳钓鱼胜地
‎以及…

translation.en: Does anybody come and report that? No.
translation.zh: ‎有人来报道过这个吗？没有

translation.en: But this comes up, and here it unloads on you.
translation.zh:
‎但这件事一发生
‎报道就铺天盖地而来

translation.en: [Jean Peters Baker] Whenever you get a call and someone says
translation.zh: ‎在这里不管何时接起电话 ‎听到的都是某某法官打电话来

translation.en: that judge so-and-so is calling,

translation.en: you hang up on that phone call you're on
translation.zh: ‎挂掉之前已经接起的电话

translation.en: and you take the judge's call.
translation.zh: ‎接起刚打来的法官的电话

translation.en: And the judge tells me his name
translation.zh: ‎法官告诉我他的名字…

translation.en: and then he tells me he's from Nodaway County. And I just...
translation.zh:
‎（特别检察官 珍彼得斯贝克） ‎…然后他告诉我
‎他是诺德韦县的 我就…

translation.en: My heart sunk a little bit, because I thought... [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎我有点受挫 因为我想…

translation.en: "Oh, I bet I know why you're calling."
translation.zh: ‎“我知道你为何打电话来”

translation.en: When the case is built on the testimony of the victim,
translation.zh:
‎（原告检方密苏里州
‎诉被告马修B巴奈特） ‎当案件是依据受害人的证词审理的

translation.en: those can be very, very hard.
translation.zh: ‎会非常困难 ‎（凯瑟琳黛西科尔曼）

translation.en: And so, I tried to collect additional evidence.
translation.zh: ‎因此 我曾尝试去收集更多的证据

translation.en: There was nothing about the rape kit
translation.zh: ‎（成年女性性侵犯检查） ‎并没有相关的强奸案证据

translation.en: I had available to me that really gave us another "a-ha" moment.
translation.zh: ‎能带给我们新的突破

translation.en: We tried to go back and find the phone.
translation.zh: ‎我们试过回头去找那部手机

translation.en: You know, "Did it exist? Did it exist at one time?
translation.zh: ‎“它存在吗？它有存在过吗？

translation.en: Could we still get it?"
translation.zh: ‎我们还能拿到吗？”

translation.en: We were unsuccessful in that regard.
translation.zh: ‎我们在这方面没能成功

translation.en: [interviewer] What was the state of the case when it was handed to you?

translation.en: In your professional opinion?
translation.zh: ‎从专业角度来看？

translation.en: I just don't think, um, I want to answer that question.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我不想回答这个问题

translation.en: So, at the end of that investigation,
translation.zh: ‎因此 在调查结束时

translation.en: I believed that we got as far as the evidence would take us.
translation.zh:
‎据我们手头所掌握的证据
‎我们已经做出了最大努力

translation.en: Sometimes, that doesn't tell a full story.
translation.zh: ‎有时 证据无法表明一切

translation.en: But in this case,
translation.zh: ‎但在这个案件中

translation.en: I believed the charge that I was able to go forward on...
translation.zh: ‎我认为我所能提出的指控…

translation.en: I knew that I had the evidence to try.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我手上有证据可以去尝试

translation.en: Mr. Barnett pled guilty to endangering the welfare of a child
translation.zh:
‎巴奈特先生
‎对二级危害儿童罪这一罪名

translation.en: in the second degree.
translation.zh: ‎承认有罪

translation.en: In this case,
translation.zh: ‎此案中

translation.en: there was insufficient evidence to go forward on a sexual assault.
translation.zh: ‎性侵犯罪名的罪证不充分

translation.en: These are very hard cases.
translation.zh: ‎这种案件很难办

translation.en: The facts are hard, often.
translation.zh: ‎事实通常很难取证

translation.en: The legal requirements can be very hard. And very hard to meet.
translation.zh:
‎法律上的要求很严苛
‎证据很难满足法律上的要求

translation.en: it just was really stressful.
translation.zh: ‎压力非常大

translation.en: We were waiting to see what was gonna happen,
translation.zh: ‎我们在等着审判结果

translation.en: what they were gonna find in the investigation, and if anything was gonna be done.
translation.zh:
‎案件的调查结果
‎以及正义能都得到伸张

translation.en: So, when it finally came out that it was just gonna be probation,
translation.zh: ‎因此 当审判结果最终只是缓刑时

translation.en: it was hard to deal with.
translation.zh: ‎很难接受

translation.en: [White] As near as I can tell, the boys are the only ones that have decided
translation.zh: ‎看得出来 只有那几个男孩决定

translation.en: that they wanna put this behind them, and try to move on with their lives,
translation.zh: ‎忘掉这件事 继续他们的人生

translation.en: and try to make something of themselves. They...
translation.zh: ‎并有所成就

translation.en: I think that all of them, with the exception of the juvenile,
translation.zh:
‎我认为他们所有人
‎除了还在读高中的

translation.en: who's still in high school, and I think that he's doing fine,
translation.zh: ‎那个青少年 我觉得他表现得还不错

translation.en: but I think all of the boys are, um, going to college,
translation.zh: ‎但我认为他们都会上大学

translation.en: and working, and trying to do better.
translation.zh: ‎工作 更加努力

translation.en: And this is one of the real fatal flaws of our society.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们社会的致命缺陷之一

translation.en: Is that it's always... it's always the boys. It's not always the boys.
translation.zh:
‎就是总将过错归咎于男孩
‎但过错并非总应该归咎于男孩

translation.en: The girls... Girls have as much culpability in this world as boys do.
translation.zh:
‎在这个世界上
‎女孩们跟男孩们一样有过失

translation.en: So, you know, everybody has to take their part of it.
translation.zh: ‎所以 人人都有责任

translation.en: And everybody has to do better.
translation.zh: ‎人人都要做得更好

translation.en: [interviewer] I absolutely agree.
translation.zh: ‎我完全同意

translation.en: In this particular case, though, the crimes were committed by boys.
translation.zh: ‎但在这个案子中 是男孩们犯了罪

translation.en: Were they? [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他们犯罪了吗？

translation.en: [Daisy] After the charges were dropped,
translation.zh: ‎控罪撤销之后

translation.en: it was just really one thing after another.
translation.zh: ‎真是一波未平一波又起

translation.en: Like, all the drama with the social media, and then I was getting in fights.
translation.zh:
‎社交媒体上的狗血事情
‎我卷入到争吵之中

translation.en: I hated going to school, I hated going out in public.
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌去学校 我讨厌去公众场所

translation.en: I couldn't handle any more.
translation.zh: ‎我再也受不了了

translation.en: I wanted to fight back with everyone,
translation.zh: ‎我想回击所有人

translation.en: and I wanted to, you know, I wanted them to believe me.
translation.zh: ‎我想他们相信我

translation.en: You already have this wound just ripped clean open
translation.zh: ‎你刚受的伤口又被撕开

translation.en: and you're vulnerable and you're going through a really hard time,
translation.zh: ‎你很脆弱 正处于一段难熬的时期

translation.en: and to have all these people attacking you on top of it,
translation.zh:
‎而且还有这么多人
‎揪住这件事来攻击你

translation.en: it almost makes the bullying seem more extreme.
translation.zh: ‎这几乎使得欺凌更加极端

translation.en: You begin to believe that these bad things they're saying about you
translation.zh:
‎你开始相信所有这些
‎他们说你的坏话

translation.en: are actually true.
translation.zh: ‎都是真的

translation.en: So, your image of yourself completely changes
translation.zh: ‎因此 你对自己的看法完全变了

translation.en: and you kind of become a shell of yourself.
translation.zh: ‎你开始看轻自己

translation.en: You almost see that, you know, doing away with yourself is the only way to fix things,
translation.zh: ‎你认为只有自杀才能解决一切

translation.en: which isn't the truth at all,
translation.zh: ‎这根本不是真的

translation.en: but it's all you can truly see when you're sitting in a dark corner
translation.zh:
‎但当你在情感上经历苦难时
‎你只能看到消极的一面

translation.en: and you're not looking around at the light.
translation.zh: ‎而不会看到积极的一面

translation.en: [Melinda] Afterwards, with the backlash,
translation.zh: ‎之后 面对所有的敌意

translation.en: we started having issues with vandalism of the house.
translation.zh: ‎又开始有人蓄意破坏我们的房子

translation.en: We had issues with people threatening to beat up the kids.
translation.zh: ‎有人威胁要殴打我家孩子

translation.en: I lost my job because of the case.
translation.zh: ‎我因为这个案子丢了工作

translation.en: Then we had our house burned down in Maryville.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们在马里维尔的房子被烧了

translation.en: It was just...
translation.zh: ‎这真是…

translation.en: really, really hard to believe.
translation.zh: ‎实在让人难以置信

translation.en: We moved back to Albany.
translation.zh: ‎（米歇尔科尔曼医生） ‎我们搬回到奥尔巴尼

translation.en: Because we still had the house here,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们在那儿还有房子

translation.en: and I thought, at least, the kids would be safe.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为 至少孩子们是安全的

translation.en: Daisy was strong in the beginning, but then it just starts to wear you down,
translation.zh:
‎一开始黛西很坚强
‎但随后这会将你折磨殆尽

translation.en: and she just got really into a dark place.
translation.zh: ‎她开始变得非常消沉

translation.en: She started to really feel like it was her fault
translation.zh: ‎她开始真的觉得那是她的错

translation.en: and feel like she should have done something different, and...
translation.zh: ‎感觉她本该做些不同的事

translation.en: she just internalized all the negativity.
translation.zh: ‎她把所有的负面影响都憋在心里

translation.en: She dyed her hair black. She shaved part of her head.
translation.zh:
‎她把头发染成黑色
‎剃光了半边的头发

translation.en: [voice breaking] She burned herself.
translation.zh: ‎她烫伤自己

translation.en: And every door in the house upstairs is broken, because...
translation.zh: ‎家里楼上的每扇门都是坏的 因为…

translation.en: we've had to kick it in to save her when she's tried to overdose.
translation.zh:
‎她试图吃药自杀时
‎我们不得不把门踢开救她

translation.en: -[girl] Hi. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎嗨

translation.en: Um, so where exactly?
translation.zh: ‎那具体在哪里？

translation.en: [girl] Are they healing?
translation.zh: ‎伤口愈合了吗？

translation.en: Make sure...
translation.zh: ‎你一定要纹好

translation.en: [girl] This thing is bumming me out.
translation.zh: ‎这东西让我很不安

translation.en: [Delaney] Finally, meeting Daisy, I learned...
translation.zh: ‎终于 见到黛西 我知道…

translation.en: that, you know...
translation.zh:
‎（德莱尼亨德森） ‎这再次让我感到安心
‎知道我不是独自一人

translation.en: It was a reassurance that I'm not alone.
translation.zh:
‎这再次让我感到安心
‎知道我不是独自一人

translation.en: Oh, that feels fantastic. Holy crap!
translation.zh: ‎感觉棒极了 天啊！

translation.en: [Delaney] Uh, this is a semicolon Daisy tattooed on me
translation.zh: ‎这是黛西给我纹的分号

translation.en: and it basically is a reminder to myself that my story's never over.
translation.zh:
‎其实这是在提醒我
‎我的故事永远不会结束

translation.en: You know, it's not over yet, and that just like a sentence...
translation.zh: ‎是还没结束 就像一句话…

translation.en: like when you're writing or typing a sentence, a semicolon means, like, that's not the end.
translation.zh:
‎好比你在写一句话的时候
‎分号代表还没写完

translation.en: Can I give you a hug? I'm Angela.
translation.zh: ‎能拥抱一下吗？我是安吉拉

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
Thank you so much for coming.
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢你能来

translation.en: [Angela Rose] This is unprecedented,
translation.zh: ‎这件事前所未有

translation.en: to bring these women together, and their moms...
translation.zh:
‎把这些女性聚集起来
‎还有她们的母亲

translation.en: that collectively have made such a difference.
translation.zh: ‎她们一起带来了大不同

translation.en: I know that this is scary, but that's why we need to get our stories and our experiences
translation.zh:
‎我知道这有点吓人
‎但正因如此我们才要把我们的故事

translation.en: out there for other moms and other high school survivors,
translation.zh:
‎讲给其他的母亲
‎以及其他的高中幸存者

translation.en: so they know that they're not alone and that this happens a lot.
translation.zh:
‎好让她们知道她们不孤单
‎这种事有很多

translation.en: Whoever wants to share first.
translation.zh: ‎谁想先来分享

translation.en: [Delaney] Okay. Um, I guess I'll go.
translation.zh: ‎好的 那我先来吧

translation.en: Okay, well, basically, when I was 16, uh, my parents went out of town
translation.zh: ‎我16岁时 父母出城去了

translation.en: and I had two girlfriends that were supposedly spending the night.
translation.zh: ‎我叫了两个女性朋友一起过夜

translation.en: And I did not know, but they invited three boys over,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道她们还邀请了3个男孩过来

translation.en: two of which I had never met before.
translation.zh: ‎其中两个我从没见过

translation.en: we were all smoking weed and I had never done that before.
translation.zh: ‎我们都吸了大麻 我之前从来没吸过

translation.en: After a while, I remember everything just got really, like, uneven.
translation.zh:
‎过了一会儿
‎我记得一切都变得模糊起来

translation.en: So, I got up and I went to my room and the two boys followed me in
translation.zh:
‎于是 我站起身去我的房间
‎那两个男孩跟了进来

translation.en: and they had locked the door.
translation.zh: ‎他们锁上了门

translation.en: I was really confused and didn't really know what was going on
translation.zh: ‎我非常困惑 不知道到底是什么情况

translation.en: and they sexually assaulted me.
translation.zh: ‎他们性侵犯了我

translation.en: Um, then...
translation.zh: ‎之后…

translation.en: [voice breaking] Then I found out that the same guy had...
translation.zh: ‎我得知其中同一个人…

translation.en: sexually assaulted another girl eight months later.
translation.zh: ‎八个月之后 又性侵了另一个女孩

translation.en: [sighs] That part's really hard.
translation.zh: ‎这部分让人很难受

translation.en: And of course I felt guilty, because if I had reported it...
translation.zh:
‎当然 我感觉很愧疚
‎因为要是我报了案

translation.en: it wouldn't have happened to the other girl.
translation.zh: ‎那个女孩就不会出事

translation.en: And she was 14.
translation.zh: ‎她当时只有14岁

translation.en: [Ella] I don't really remember much, but...
translation.zh: ‎我其实不记得太多 但…

translation.en: I got up and tried to leave
translation.zh: ‎我站起身想要离开…

translation.en: and they, punched me, knocked me out, cracked my jaw,
translation.zh:
‎（艾拉
‎加利福尼亚州新港滩） ‎…他们动手打我 把我打倒
‎打坏了我的下巴

translation.en: and I was unconscious for six hours. And...
translation.zh: ‎我昏迷过去长达六个小时

translation.en: They both just continuously raped me for six hours, until I woke up.
translation.zh:
‎然后他们不间断地强奸了我六个小时
‎直到我醒过来

translation.en: And then, yeah, I...
translation.zh: ‎然后 我…

translation.en: walked home in bloody clothes the next day.
translation.zh: ‎第二天穿着带血的衣服走回了家

translation.en: [Jada] I was laid out, passed out on the floor,
translation.zh: ‎我喝醉了 晕倒在地板上

translation.en: while the, um, 18-year old was on top of me.
translation.zh: ‎一个18岁的男孩压在我身上

translation.en: They took pictures.
translation.zh: ‎他们拍了照片

translation.en: I'm sorry. [clears throat]
translation.zh: ‎对不起

translation.en: They took pictures. Uh, they posted it online.
translation.zh: ‎他们拍了照片 发在了网上

translation.en: And, uh...
We reported it as soon as it happened
translation.zh: ‎我们马上就报警了

translation.en: and it took them forever. And we had to report it again.
translation.zh:
‎但一直没人来
‎我们不得不再次报警

translation.en: And then everything just went black. And then I remember waking up in my yard,
translation.zh:
‎接着我就失去了意识
‎之后我只记得在自家院子里醒过来

translation.en: half-frozen and trying to make it to the door.
translation.zh: ‎都快冻僵了 努力走到门口

translation.en: And I remember not being able to feel my feet.
translation.zh: ‎我记得我感觉不到自己的脚

translation.en: And I remember having this really vivid dream,
translation.zh: ‎我还记得做了一个非常真实的梦

translation.en: almost like I was lucid dreaming, that my dad was just like,
translation.zh:
‎就好像是做清醒梦之类的
‎我爸爸说

translation.en: "Hey, you gotta get up and go inside." But no one really believed me.
translation.zh: ‎“嘿 你得起来进屋去” 但没人相信我

translation.en: [Delaney] It's unbelievable what people will say about you and what, you know,
translation.zh: ‎很难相信 人们会怎么说你

translation.en: how the truth gets hidden when so many people don't believe you.
translation.zh:
‎而且当这么多人不相信你时
‎真相就被掩盖了

translation.en: And even now, I fight every single day
translation.zh: ‎即使现在我每天

translation.en: trying to convince myself that what I did was right
translation.zh:
‎仍然在努力说服自己
‎我之前所做的是对的

translation.en: and what I'm still doing is right, so, um...
translation.zh: ‎而且我现在所做的也是对的

translation.en: I mean, just having Daisy, and Ella and Jada, like...
translation.zh: ‎跟黛西 艾拉和杰达一起

translation.en: I feel like we are an army, so...
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们是一支军队

translation.en: I'm glad I have all of you guys here today. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我很高心你们今天都来了

translation.en: [man] The water is so cold, every time.
translation.zh: ‎水好冷 每次都是

translation.en: [Charlie] I think Daisy's coping with things a lot better.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得黛西的状况好了很多

translation.en: We've gotten her into some intensive counseling.
translation.zh: ‎我们让她参加了很多心理咨询

translation.en: She's still that sweet girl, but she's like a hedgehog.
translation.zh:
‎她还是那个甜美的女孩
‎但她像个刺猬

translation.en: She's got the quills and she'll poke you with them
translation.zh:
‎身上长满了刺
‎在你接触到她的温柔之前

translation.en: before you ever get to anything soft.
translation.zh: ‎她会用那些刺扎你

translation.en: It's sad, but...
translation.zh: ‎很悲伤 但…

translation.en: I'm sure not scooping her up off the bathroom floor,
translation.zh:
‎我相信再也不用
‎从浴室地板上扶起她

translation.en: running her to the ER on my shoulder anymore
translation.zh: ‎抱着她送去急诊室了

translation.en: and that, in itself, is a blessing to me.
translation.zh: ‎这对我来说就是一件好事了

translation.en: [Charlie and boys] Dear Lord.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的主

translation.en: The battles we go through in life.
translation.zh: ‎我们人生中所经历的战斗

translation.en: Give us a chance that's fair.
translation.zh: ‎请给予我们一次公平的机会

translation.en: A chance to earn our stripes.
translation.zh: ‎一次获得升级的机会

translation.en: If we should win.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们要赢

translation.en: Let it be by the code.
translation.zh: ‎就正大光明地赢

translation.en: If we should lose.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们输了

translation.en: We stand by the road.
translation.zh: ‎我们就站在路旁

translation.en: Day by day!
translation.zh: ‎日复一日

translation.en: We get better and better!
translation.zh: ‎我们越来越好

translation.en: Till we can't be beat!
translation.zh: ‎直到我们所向披靡

translation.en: Won't be beat!
translation.zh: ‎不再被打倒

translation.en: -[Charlie] Let's go, boys. -[boys] Go, boys!
translation.zh:
‎-冲啊 伙计们
‎-上吧 伙计们

translation.en: [Charlie] The signs. Do we remember the signs?
translation.zh: ‎手势 大家都记得手势吗？

translation.en: [boys] Steal.
translation.zh: ‎偷垒

translation.en: [boys] Three hard steps. Yeah, three hard steps.
translation.zh:
‎-三步
‎-对 三步偷垒

translation.en: Any questions? Any at all? All right. Get focused. Let's go.
translation.zh:
‎有问题吗？没有吗？
‎好的 注意力集中 走吧

translation.en: [Charlie] I never pictured myself being a Little League coach.
translation.zh:
‎说真的 我从没想过
‎会在少年棒球队当教练

translation.en: When they asked me to do it, I kind of rolled my eyes, like,
translation.zh:
‎他们第一次来找我的时候
‎我翻翻白眼说

translation.en: "They're not gonna stand a chance, I'm gonna make them run."
translation.zh:
‎“他们绝没有任何希望
‎我会把他们打发掉的”

translation.en: And, you know, you bond with those kids.
translation.zh: ‎后来就跟这些孩子们变得很亲密

translation.en: -Go. -[boy] Run it out! Run it out!
Yeah!
[Charlie] I don't think I ever thought about teaching them greater life lessons
translation.zh: ‎我没想过要给他们讲什么人生道理

translation.en: until I had heard a couple boys
translation.zh: ‎直到我听说有几个男孩

translation.en: making comments about a girl, and I said,
translation.zh: ‎议论一个女孩 我说

translation.en: "All right, we're having a pow-wow now," and I circled everybody up
translation.zh:
‎“好了 我们要谈谈了”
‎我让大家围成圈

translation.en: and I was like, "Here's the thing, guys, I'm here to teach you baseball,
translation.zh: ‎我说：“各位 我来是教你们打棒球的

translation.en: but this isn't the kind of stuff I accept.
translation.zh: ‎但我不会容忍这种事

translation.en: This isn't what I'm about.
translation.zh: ‎我不是这样的人

translation.en: If it's what you're about, that's fine, but that's not what we are gonna be about
translation.zh:
‎如果你是这样的人 那好吧
‎但我们队不是这样的

translation.en: and you are more than welcome to take yourself out of here."
translation.zh: ‎欢迎你自行离队”

translation.en: After that one incident, something clicked. It really did click.
translation.zh:
‎那次事情以后
‎我明白了一些事 真正明白了一些事

translation.en: I don't look to be their father or anything,
translation.zh: ‎我不想成为他们的父亲

translation.en: but I thought, "I want to be part of something bigger than myself."
translation.zh:
‎但我觉得：“我想让自己
‎发挥更大的作用”

translation.en: And maybe I can kind of help them along.
translation.zh: ‎也许我可以帮助他们

translation.en: Down!
translation.zh: ‎退场！

translation.en: [boy] Race ya.
translation.zh: ‎跑啊

translation.en: There you go. There you go.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: [Charlie] I really just enjoy watching them grow.
translation.zh: ‎我很享受看着他们成长

translation.en: Because in the process, they help me,
translation.zh: ‎因为在这个过程中他们帮助我

translation.en: they teach me a lot more about myself and how I was at that age,
translation.zh:
‎他们让我更了解自己
‎以及我那么大的时候是怎样的

translation.en: and I guess I really start to understand a lot more.
translation.zh: ‎我开始理解得更多

translation.en: -Atta boy. -[man] Way to go.
translation.zh:
‎-好小子
‎-很好

translation.en: Way to help yourself, Johnny.
translation.zh:
‎-干得好 强尼
‎-加油 强尼

translation.en: [Sheila] We said our goodbyes to Audrie.
translation.zh: ‎我们跟奥德拉告了别

translation.en: But, I mean, we kept thinking,
translation.zh: ‎但我们一直在想

translation.en: you know, "What could have been so bad that would've driven her to this?"
translation.zh:
‎“到底是怎样的悲伤
‎才会让她选择自杀？” ‎（奥德拉泰勒波特英年早逝）

translation.en: After the night of the sexual assault,
translation.zh: ‎在发生性侵之后那晚

translation.en: her communications were captured on Facebook Messenger.
translation.zh:
‎她在脸书聊天客户端的交谈记录
‎被截取下来

translation.en: Sometimes the person tormenting her was faceless or nameless.
translation.zh:
‎有时候折磨她的那个人
‎没有头像或是名字

translation.en: We know from what she said in her process of investigating her own crime
translation.zh:
‎我们从她调查
‎自己罪行的过程中得知…

translation.en: that she felt, because of what had happened to her,
translation.zh:
‎（奥德拉的妈妈
‎希拉波特） ‎…她觉得因为发生在她身上的事

translation.en: her reputation was ruined.
translation.zh: ‎毁了她的清誉

translation.en: And it was ruined forever.
translation.zh: ‎而且是永远地毁了

translation.en: She didn't see...
translation.zh: ‎她看不到

translation.en: any light at the end of the tunnel, any future.
translation.zh: ‎任何光明或是希望

translation.en: [Larry] The boys, they were 15 at the time.
translation.zh: ‎那些男孩 当时他们15岁

translation.en: They were convicted of having child pornography,
translation.zh: ‎他们被控持有儿童色情照片

translation.en: um, and committing, um, sexual battery.
translation.zh: ‎以及实施性暴力

translation.en: Multiple felonies for each boy.
translation.zh: ‎每个孩子都被控几项重罪

translation.en: One of 'em got 30 days, one of 'em got 45 days.
translation.zh:
‎其中一个被判入狱30天
‎另一个被判入狱45天

translation.en: But it was non-consecutive, it was weekend only.
translation.zh: ‎但并非是连续执行 只需在周末入狱

translation.en: Basically, weekend detention.
translation.zh: ‎其实就是周末拘禁

translation.en: They were never suspended or expelled.
translation.zh: ‎他们没有被勒令退学

translation.en: We pretty much knew that, as juveniles, they were gonna get a slap on the wrist.
translation.zh:
‎我们都知道 作为青少年
‎他们会被轻判

translation.en: All right, I should give you the terms and we can go over them right now.
translation.zh:
‎把条款给你们
‎我们就可以立刻看一遍了

translation.en: Number one, the boys admit the allegations
translation.zh: ‎第一条 男孩们接受指控

translation.en: as contained in the respected criminal complaints that pertain to Audrie Pott.
translation.zh: ‎承认对奥德拉波特的犯罪指控

translation.en: [lawyer] The second term was that their written apology is public.
translation.zh: ‎第二条是他们的书面道歉将公布于众

translation.en: They're sorry for the family's loss, and they basically go through
translation.zh:
‎他们为给波特一家带来的损失
‎以及一切对于

translation.en: all the things that were important to Larry and Sheila.
translation.zh:
‎拉里和希拉来说重要的东西
‎而感到遗憾

translation.en: The amazing thing about this is, had we have gone to a trial,
translation.zh:
‎这样做的好处在于
‎这事要是上了法庭

translation.en: we would never have been able to get the result that we got.
translation.zh:
‎我们永远得不到
‎我们现在所得到的结果

translation.en: And who knows how you would...
translation.zh: ‎而且谁知道你们会…

translation.en: [Sheila] We brought the wrongful death suit because we knew
translation.zh:
‎我们起诉的是过失杀人罪 ‎因为我们知道在未成年人法庭那里
‎我们伸张不了正义

translation.en: that we weren't gonna get justice in the juvenile court.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们知道在未成年人法庭那里
‎我们伸张不了正义

translation.en: I felt that, in the civil suit at least,
translation.zh: ‎我认为至少在民事法庭这里

translation.en: it would be public and people would know what really happened.
translation.zh:
‎案件将会公开
‎人们可以了解事情的真相

translation.en: It was about them taking responsibility and accountability for their actions.
translation.zh: ‎要让他们为自身的行为负责

translation.en: But ultimately, for us, it was about clearing Audrie's name.
translation.zh: ‎但最终对于我们 是要为奥德拉正名

translation.en: Yes. Something very wrong happened here. It shouldn't happen to anyone else.
translation.zh:
‎是的 这里发生了很不正确的事情
‎这不应该再发生在其他人身上

translation.en: And the only reason, we all know, because Audrie was extremely private,
translation.zh:
‎我们全都知道 唯一的原因
‎是因为奥德拉不喜欢把事情说出来

translation.en: that we could have brought it forward is because she's not with us anymore.
translation.zh:
‎而我们之所以能把这件事讲出来
‎是因为她已经不在了

translation.en: I think, more so than ever before,
translation.zh: ‎我认为 相比与以往任何时候

translation.en: this subject is out there, and people are talking about it,
translation.zh: ‎人们对于这件事议论纷纷

translation.en: and this has to stop.
translation.zh: ‎这需要被制止

translation.en: [John R] Part of our settlement in the lawsuit was to...
translation.zh:
‎（原告希拉波特及劳伦斯波特
‎诉被告约翰B及约翰R） ‎（调解书） ‎法律调解书的其中一部分…

translation.en: have a 45-minute interview with you guys here.
translation.zh: ‎要求我们接受你们45分钟的采访

translation.en: We had to, um...
translation.zh: ‎（我们承认犯下控罪）

translation.en: We had to plead to stuff in order for me to graduate, um, high school.
translation.zh: ‎我们得认罪以期能高中毕业 ‎（传播有关奥德拉的不雅照片）

translation.en: I've definitely learned from all this.
translation.zh: ‎这着着实实给我上了一课 ‎（奥德拉并未同意）

translation.en: I mean, there's a lot of different things that guys and girls think.
translation.zh: ‎男生跟女生有很多事想法不同 ‎（奥德拉不该被如此对待）

translation.en: [interviewer 1] What have you learned about girls?
translation.zh: ‎关于女生你都学到了什么？

translation.en: Um, I mean, girls, they gossip, really. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎女生 爱八卦

translation.en: There's a lot of gossip between girls and, uh, you know, um...
translation.zh: ‎女生间有很多八卦… ‎（为不实流言道歉）

translation.en: guys are more laid-back and don't really care.
translation.zh: ‎…男生更大条 不怎么在乎

translation.en: So, that's what I've learned, for sure.
translation.zh: ‎所以 这就是我所学到的 真的

translation.en: [interviewer 2] I'm curious if there was a moment during that night,
translation.zh: ‎我很好奇 那晚有没有那么一刻

translation.en: when you knew, "This has gone too far."
translation.zh: ‎你知道事情失去了控制

translation.en: Was there a moment like that for you?
translation.zh: ‎对你来说有吗？

translation.en: [John R] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎有

translation.en: [interviewer 2] Can you talk about that?
translation.zh: ‎你能谈谈吗？

translation.en: [John R] Well, I don't know, I've kind of always been unhappy after that. I mean...
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 那之后我总是很不开心

translation.en: it wasn't right and...
translation.zh: ‎那样不对

translation.en: I knew that, I mean, at the time.
translation.zh: ‎那时我就知道了

translation.en: There was drinking involved, and it's not like... we thought everything was okay.
translation.zh:
‎那晚我们喝了酒
‎我们并非觉得一切都没事

translation.en: I mean, yeah... [stammers] Nothing was okay, but...
translation.zh:
‎那晚我们喝了酒
‎我们并非觉得一切都没事 ‎我是说 什么都不对

translation.en: I've always felt, like, not okay about it.
translation.zh: ‎但我总觉得那样不对

translation.en: Like, I don't know, every day or so.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 每天都是

translation.en: I don't know what I really thought back then.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道当时自己到底在想什么

translation.en: But I just never imagined anything like what happened now.
translation.zh: ‎但我从没想到会发生现在这样的事

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't imagine my whole life to be changed...
translation.zh: ‎我没想到自己的整个人生都被改变了

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道

translation.en: Like, forever changed, so...
translation.zh: ‎永远地改变了

translation.en: [Daisy] Personally, I don't know what has happened with the boys since that night.
translation.zh:
‎个人来说 我并不知道那晚之后
‎那几个男孩怎么样了

translation.en: But I have a feeling that, you know,
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得

translation.en: since they haven't had to go through as much crap as I have,
translation.zh:
‎由于他们并没有经历
‎我所经历的这些困难

translation.en: that they haven't really had time to reflect on who they are as people
translation.zh:
‎他们并没去真正反省
‎作为人他们是谁

translation.en: or else they would've stepped forward and taken responsibility.
translation.zh: ‎否则他们就会站出来承担责任

translation.en: Honestly, at this point in my life,
translation.zh: ‎说实话 此刻

translation.en: I can't even recognize the person I was four years ago.
translation.zh: ‎我甚至都认不出四年前的那个自己了

translation.en: At one point in time, I really... I just wanted revenge
translation.zh: ‎曾经有那么一刻 我非常想要报复

translation.en: and that's all I wanted and stuff, but...
translation.zh: ‎我只想报复

translation.en: I mean, it's a lot harder
translation.zh: ‎但完全沉浸在仇恨里

translation.en: just living your life full of hate and everything, so I just figured,
translation.zh: ‎那只会更加艰难 于是我想明白了

translation.en: at one point, I was like, "I'm kind of done with just being mad at everyone,
translation.zh: ‎我想：“我不会再去一直

translation.en: and being mad all the time, and just being a big ball of emotion.
translation.zh:
‎仇恨所有人
‎无时无刻都被情绪左右了

translation.en: I wanna be happy and move on with my life."
translation.zh: ‎我想开开心心地继续我的人生”

translation.en: So that's just kind of what I did, I mean...
translation.zh: ‎所以我就这么做了

translation.en: And that doesn't always mean just forgetting the past,
translation.zh: ‎这并不代表要忘记过去

translation.en: it just kind of means forgiving the past.
translation.zh: ‎而是要放手过去

translation.en: [man] Daisy Coleman is a recipient of an athletic scholarship
translation.zh: ‎黛西科尔曼拿到了密苏里谷学院的

translation.en: from Missouri Valley College.
translation.zh: ‎体育奖学金

translation.en: The class of 2015 awards an honorary diploma to Audrie Taylor Pott.
translation.zh:
‎2015级毕业班授予
‎奥德拉泰勒波特荣誉证书

translation.en: I was way too afraid to report it
translation.zh: ‎我当时因为太害怕而没敢报案

translation.en: because I was bullied, I was ostracized, I was threatened.
translation.zh: ‎因为我被欺凌 被排斥 受到威胁

translation.en: I found my voice when I decided to show my face in my first interview.
translation.zh:
‎当我决定首次上镜接受采访时
‎我又敢说话了

translation.en: The guys recorded and took photos of the sexual assault,
translation.zh: ‎那几个人拍了性侵的视频和照片

translation.en: and then posted them online.
translation.zh: ‎然后发在网上

translation.en: Finally, after being misunderstood for years
translation.zh: ‎最终 在遭受误解多年

translation.en: and going through so much pain and absolutely hating myself,
translation.zh: ‎并经历了诸多痛苦和自我仇恨之后

translation.en: I decided that, if no one's gonna talk about it, then I will.
translation.zh:
‎我决定要是没人要讲出这件事
‎那就由我来把它讲出来

translation.en: Since my friends didn't stand up for me, I urge other people to speak out,
translation.zh:
‎既然我的朋友们没有为我挺身而出
‎我希望其他人能讲出来

translation.en: because you can't ignore an army of voices.
translation.zh: ‎因为你们不能忽视我们

translation.en: And I would like to see people stand up for others who have been assaulted.
translation.zh:
‎我也希望看到大家
‎为了其他受害者挺身而出

translation.en: Because the words of our enemies aren't as awful as the silence of our friends.
translation.zh:
‎因为敌人语言的破坏性
‎不及朋友们的沉默

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢
